dse_integrity_analyzer_inputs.purpose: Specification defining mandatory log/telemetry structures required for DIAL RCA, enforcing determinism in forensic analysis.

State_Graph_Signature_SGS.verification_mandate: Cryptographically verifiable against independent Ledger (If available)

security_mandate: All telemetry data must be time-stamped, signed by the originating actor, and stored immutably prior to IH trigger.
